modShortDescription: This mod adds a robot called Lucy, that is extended from the assets and work done in the Community Creature Packs.
modDescription:
This mod adds a robot called Lucy, that is extended from the assets and work done in the Community Creature Packs.

**Dependencies:** You must have this mod loaded as well: [0-CreaturePackMechs](https://7daystodiemods.com/creature-packs-a-community-entity-project/)

## Details

* Why? Because Doughphunghus wanted a robot that had a lot to say.
* Lucy is not as hard to kill as the default mechRobot, and behaves slightly less aggressively.
* Lucyâ€™s previous occupations were: Late night phone bot, Rock and mineral sorter, Artist.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Mods-a19/tree/main/Doughs-Mech-Lucy)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17197-doughs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Doughphunghus](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/doughphunghus/)
